note.p: Resided in Petley’s Cottage, Down, 1858–9. Possibly Oliver Wimburn Lloyd (1828–1917), solicitor; his eldest son, Robert Carleton Lloyd (1854–1908), was born at Foots Cray, eight miles north east of Down, in 1854. O. W. Lloyd declared bankrupt, 1865.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/283/61/19)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1906 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 March 2017)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1859
